ctu.nengoros.util.sync.impl

Class SyncedUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.util.sync.impl.SyncedUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SyncedUnitInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsNeuralModule, BasicDecoder

    public abstract class SyncedUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements SyncedUnitInterface
    Class for synchronization (e.g. Nengo with ROS components) Unit has two states: ready/notReady Unit is ready if: -has set flag: asynchronous=true (simulaiton is not waiting for it) -all its childs are ready -does not have any childs and is set to state: ready
